div.span:
Data from snyk populates
Cloudquery tables

Data from snyk populates
Cloudquery tables

Data from snyk populates
Cloudquery tables
Cloudquery writes data to the DB

1. Cloudquery data is used
to calculate departmental
compliance with obligations

2. Repocop stores compliance
information about repos as a table
in the cloudquery DB

Repocop raises PRs to fix issues,
that are reviewed by developers

Compliance dashboards are used
by DevX developers to track
departmental progress towards obligations

Repocop sends notifications of
events, or warnings to teams
via Anghammarad

Anghammarad delivers messages
to developers about changes
to their systems

Cloudquery data powers
grafana dashboards

Compliance dashboards are used
by developers to track
their team's progress towards
obligations. They also have read
access to raw cloudquery tables.
Cloudquery Database
Snyk Rest API
GitHub Rest API
CloudQuery Batch Jobs
Developer on the DevX team
P&E Developer
Repocop Lambdas
AWS APIs
Grafana
Anghammarad
